oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An account by Dia!kwain of the time that he played the !goura while the rain fell and caused lightning at night. The rain struck them with lightning and they could not see and his mother tells him that the rain wants to kill them. 1) This story is found in Books V-20 and V-22.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dia!kwain plays the bow in a thunderstorm, or, The thunderstorm
